title: How to Delete Plenty of Fish

steps.headline: Go to https://www.pof.com/deleteaccount.aspx in a web browser.
steps.description: You can use either a desktop or mobile browser to delete your account.

steps.headline: Click or tap Delete My Account.
steps.description: You'll see this light blue button at the bottom of the page under the header "Ready to Remove Your Account from Plenty of Fish?"

steps.headline: Log in (if prompted).
steps.description: Your account has to be at least 24 hours old before you can delete it.

steps.headline: Fill out the form.
steps.description: You'll need to enter your username, password, and reason for deleting your account.

steps.headline: Click or tap Delete My Plenty of Fish Account.
steps.description: You'll see this light blue button below the form on the right side of the page. You'll get a confirmation page that your account has been deleted.

text: Go to https://www.pof.com/deleteaccount.aspx in a web browser. You can use either a desktop or mobile browser to delete your account. Click or tap Delete My Account. You'll see this light blue button at the bottom of the page under the header "Ready to Remove Your Account from Plenty of Fish?" Log in (if prompted). Your account has to be at least 24 hours old before you can delete it. Fill out the form. You'll need to enter your username, password, and reason for deleting your account. Click or tap Delete My Plenty of Fish Account. You'll see this light blue button below the form on the right side of the page. You'll get a confirmation page that your account has been deleted.
